summary: Vim support for writing Scala code.
name: vim-scala
description: This script is a fork of the code that came with Scala for Vim.  The syntax code was pretty good but the indent code was pretty bad; this is better.  It's not perfect... it's better :)
install_details:
The plugin is at https://github.com/ewiplayer/vim-scala

Either go there and click "Download" or use 'git' to get it as you normally would with 'git'.  Please enhance / fix if you can.

You should be using 'pathogen' to manage you Vim plugins; if you're not, put that in first :)  Then copy 'vim-scala' to ~/.vim/bundle and restart Vim.
